- Public Safety
  
  In an emergency, call 911 right away! To reach the authorities for non-emergencies, call 303.288.1535. 
  
  We are committed to the safety of people and property in the city.

#### Mayor Meredith Leighty

Voting History

- [As Ward 1 council member](https://webdocs.northglenn.org/vote/Meredith%20Leighty,%20Ward%201)
- [As mayor](https://webdocs.northglenn.org/vote/Meredith%20Leighty,%20Mayor)

Term of Office

- Meredith Leighty was elected as a Ward 1 [City Council](https://www.northglenn.org/council) representative in November 2017.
- She was appointed Mayor Pro Tem on July 22, 2019. Former Mayor Pro Tem [Antonio B. Esquibel](https://www.northglenn.org/antonioesquibel) had been appointed mayor in June.
- Leighty was elected mayor in the Nov. 5, 2019 election.
- She was re-elected as mayor in the November 2023 election.

Mingle with the Mayor  
Come talk with Mayor Meredith Leighty and find out what's going on in Northglenn. See the [Engage with Council](https://www.northglenn.org/government/city_council/engage_with_city_council.php) page for the latest schedule.  Events will take place at various locations throughout the city. Call 303.450.8713 for more information.

Mayor's Monthly Minute  
Check out the mayor's short [video](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL30yzmMy1S02HNCrgNl9tquIMb89pUC2G) each month!  Mayor Leighty chats about recent council activities, upcoming events, and more.
